    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String description,
    java.lang.String image)
        Create a room described "description" with a given image. Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "in a kitchen" or "in an open court yard".

    • Method Detail

      • setExit

        public void setExit(java.lang.String direction,
           Room neighbor)
        Define an exit from this room.

      • setItem

        public void setItem(java.lang.String itemName,
           Item item)

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Room's item getter

      • getShortDescription

        public java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Return the description of the room (the one that was defined in the constructor).

      • getLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        Return a long description of this room, in the form: You are in the kitchen. Exits: north west

      • getItemString

        public java.lang.String getItemString()

      • getItemDescriptionString

        public java.lang.String getItemDescriptionString()

      • getExitString

        public java.lang.String getExitString()
        Return a string describing the room's exits, for example "Exits: north west".

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
        Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.

      • getImageName

        public java.lang.String getImageName()
        Return a string describing the room's image name
